quizSynopsis: Test your knowledge about Premier League facts!

questions.question: Which Premier League club has won the most titles?
questions.explanation: Manchester United holds the record for most Premier League titles.

questions.question: Who holds the record for the most goals in a single Premier League season?
questions.messageForCorrectAnswer: Correct! Erling Haaland set the record in the 2022/23 season.
questions.messageForIncorrectAnswer: Incorrect. The correct answer is Erling Haaland.
questions.explanation: Erling Haaland scored 36 goals in the 2022/23 Premier League season.

questions.question: Which team went unbeaten in the 2003/04 Premier League season?
questions.messageForCorrectAnswer: Correct answer. Arsenal went unbeaten that season.

questions.question: Who is the Premier League's all-time top scorer?
questions.messageForCorrectAnswer: Correct answer. Alan Shearer is the all-time top scorer.
questions.messageForIncorrectAnswer: Incorrect. Alan Shearer holds the record.
questions.explanation: Alan Shearer scored 260 Premier League goals, the most in history.

questions.question: Which team won the first Premier League title in 1992/93?
questions.messageForCorrectAnswer: Correct! Manchester United won the inaugural Premier League.
questions.messageForIncorrectAnswer: Incorrect. Manchester United won the 1992/93 title.
questions.explanation: Manchester United won the first Premier League title in 1993.

questions.question: Who was the Premier League's top scorer in the 2023/24 season?
questions.messageForCorrectAnswer: Correct! Erling Haaland topped the charts again.
questions.messageForIncorrectAnswer: Incorrect. The correct answer is Erling Haaland.
questions.explanation: Erling Haaland was the Premier League's top scorer in the 2023/24 season.

questions.question: Which club is nicknamed 'The Foxes'?
questions.messageForCorrectAnswer: Correct answer. Leicester City is known as 'The Foxes'.
questions.messageForIncorrectAnswer: Incorrect. The correct answer is Leicester City.

questions.question: Which player has the most assists in Premier League history?
questions.messageForCorrectAnswer: Correct! Ryan Giggs holds the assists record.
questions.messageForIncorrectAnswer: Incorrect. Ryan Giggs has the most assists.
questions.explanation: Ryan Giggs has the most Premier League assists, with 162.

questions.question: Which club did Manchester City defeat in the 2023 FA Cup final?
questions.messageForCorrectAnswer: Correct! Manchester City beat Manchester United.
questions.messageForIncorrectAnswer: Incorrect. Manchester City defeated Manchester United.
questions.explanation: Manchester City beat Manchester United 2-1 in the 2023 FA Cup final.

questions.question: Which Premier League team plays their home games at Anfield?
questions.messageForIncorrectAnswer: Incorrect. Liverpool's home stadium is Anfield.
questions.explanation: Liverpool has played at Anfield since 1892.
